doc.previous: An effort was approved on 2005 to provide low cost citywide Wi Fi service to the city Wireless Philadelphia would have been the first municipal internet utility offering in a large US city but the plan was abandoned in 2008 as EarthLink pushed back the completion date several times Mayor Nutter s administration closed the project in 2009 after an attempt to revitalize it failed 149
doc.after: Philadelphia has seven official sister cities as designated by the Citizen Diplomacy International Philadelphia 150  Philadelphia also has three partnership cities or regions 150
